original_title: Duran Duran: MTV New Year's Eve Ball
overview: This DVD-V is a recording of the original broadcast of Duran Duran at the Palladium in New York City, USA on 31 December 1982. This was the 2nd Annual MTV's New Year's Eve Rock 'N' Roll Ball. Originally aired on MTV, the show was also simulcast on FM radio for the King Biscuit Flower Hour.
title: Duran Duran: MTV New Year's Eve Ball
